subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Dwyane Wade’s dazzling 55-second stretch shortly after tip-off was part of 11 blocks for Miami as the Heat held Memphis to 39 percent shooting to win its second straight game.
snippet: Dwyane Wade’s dazzling 55-second stretch shortly after tip-off was part of 11 blocks for Miami as the Heat held Memphis to 39 percent shooting to win its second straight game.
